Class Fraction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pwhelp01.Fraction

  • public class Fraction
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents part of a whole or a number of equal parts
    Author:
    Keith Mannock, Pete Whelpton

    • Constructor Detail

      • Fraction

        public Fraction(int num,
                int denom)
         throws java.lang.ArithmeticException
        Constructor for a new fraction. Fraction will be simplified.
        Parameters:
        num - numerator
        denom - denominator
        Throws:
        java.lang.ArithmeticException - if the denom is zero or equal to Integer.MIN_VALUE
